scripts.addNoJekyll: echo Prevent not routing folders starting with _ > dist/.nojekyll
scripts.predeploy: (if exist "dist" rmdir /s /q "dist";) && git worktree add dist gh-pages -f
scripts.deploy: pnpm run build && pnpm run addNoJekyll && cd dist && git add --all && git commit -m "Update gh-pages" && git push origin gh-pages && cd ..
